title: Olivia Attwood puts on a VERY busty display as she joins a stylish Amber Turner at event
text:
She accepted a proposal from boyfriend Bradley Dack during a romantic trip to Dubai this month.

And Olivia Attwood enjoyed a solo outing on Thursday, as she stepped out alongside Amber Turner at the star-studded SistaGlam Influencer dinner in Knightsbridge.

The TOWIE star, 28, put on a very busty display at the event, which launched the brands Autumn/Winter collection, as she wowed in a plunging wrap-front dress.

Wow! Olivia Attwood put on a VERY busty display in a plunging sequin dress as she joined a stylish Amber Turner at Sistaglam fashion event in London on Thursday

Olivia's ensemble was covered in sparkling sequins, which had an ombre pattern across the front.

She paired the racy number with black thigh-high boots, while she accessorised the look with a designer handbag.

Her golden locks were styled in glamorous waves that cascade over her shoulders, and she wore a light palette of make-up to highlight her pretty features.

Glam: Olivia's ensemble was covered in sparkling sequins which had an ombre pattern

Gorgeous: Her golden locks were styled in glamorous waves that cascade over her shoulders, and she wore a light palette of make-up to highlight her pretty features

Boots made for walking: Olivia paired the racy number with black thigh-high boots, while she accessorised the look with a designer handbag

Gal pals: Olivia was joined by fellow TOWIE star Chloe Ross at the event

Meanwhile Amber Turner looked sensational in a black gown, which had a daring side split and a plunging neckline.

She stepped out in a pair of perspex heels, while she kept her personal items in a small black clutch bag.

Her blonde locks were brushed into a sleek, straight style, and she wore a glamorous palette of make-up for the occasion.

Chic: Amber stepped out in a pair of perspex heels, while she kept her personal items in a small black clutch bag

Dazzling: Her blonde locks were brushed into a sleek, straight style, and she wore a glamorous palette of make-up for the occasion

Beaming: Amber appeared to be in good spirits as she arrived at the event

Accessorise: She glammed up her outfit with a gold watch

Legs for days! Amber showed off her Essex tan in the edgy ensemble

Olivia - who has been in an on/off relationship with footballer Bradley for four years - shared sweet Instagram snaps of the pair kissing along the beach in Dubai a week ago following the romantic proposal.

The star joked the sportsman 'must be crazy' as she and her new fiancé posed on the sandy shores of the holiday hotspot.

The outspoken reality star - who recently underwent a £2,500 jawline, chin lipo and contouring procedure - captioned the photos: 'He must be crazy... Here’s to forever . I love you BD.'

Newly-engaged: Olivia showed off her engagement ring as she posed at the event

Fashionistas: Olivia and Chloe were in high spirits as they posed for photos

Stunning: Chloe looked sensational in a floral lace dress and slip on heels

Ethereal: Influencer Georgie Clarke looked stylish in a white floral gown

Olivia and the Blackburn Rovers midfielder first embarked on a relationship in 2015, but broke up when she appeared on Love Island two years later - where she dated co-star Chris Hughes.

After the breakdown of her seven-month romance with reality star Chris, 26, the blonde beauty went on the search for love as she appeared on 2018's Celebs Go Dating.

Despite flirting up a storm with Diversity's Sam Craske on the E4 show, Olivia rekindled things with hunky Bradley in December last year.

The media personality recently insisted her romance with Bradley is 'more serious than ever' in an interview with MailOnline and admitted she's 'old-fashioned' when it comes to marriage.

'He must be crazy': Olivia announced her engagement to Bradley on Instagram over a week ago, following a four-year on/off relationship
